content.eamr: ( ing-5 "2 (4 ounce) cans mushroom pieces, drained" )

content.text: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans kidney beans with liquid
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "2 (15.25 ounce) cans kidney beans with liquid" )

content.text: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, brown ground beef together with onion, crushed red pepper, garlic powder, and seasoned pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "brown"@40:45 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "ground beef"@46:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "onion"@72:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "crushed red pepper"@79:97 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic powder"@99:112 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "seasoned pepper"@118:133 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@27:38 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Drain off the fat, and place the mixture into a slow cooker.
2) Stir mushrooms, baked beans, kidney beans with liquid, tomato paste, sugar, carrots, celery, peppers, beer, and barbeque sauce into the slow cooker.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mushrooms"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "baked beans"@19:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "kidney beans with liquid"@32:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "tomato paste"@58:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "sugar"@72:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "carrots"@79:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "celery"@88:94 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "peppers"@96:103 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-12 )
			:ref ( ing-13 )
			:ref ( ing-14 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-15 "beer"@105:109 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-18 "barbeque sauce"@115:129 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "the slow cooker"@135:150 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Season with hot sauce and more crushed red pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-17 "hot sauce"@15:24 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-16 "more crushed red pepper"@29:52 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Cover, and cook on Low for 4 to 5 hours.
